Standard Exclusions 
We will not make any payment for any claim in respect of any Insured Person caused by, arising 
from or attributable to any of the following unless expressly stated to the contrary in this Policy: 
i) 
Treatment arising from or consequent upon war or any act of war, invasion, act of foreign 
enemy (whether war be declared or not or caused during service in the armed forces of any 
country), civil war, public defence, rebellion, revolution, insurrection, military or usurped acts,
